targets.query: SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_user" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_idle" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_interrupt" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_nice" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_system" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_steal" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_wait" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "memory_used" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "memory_buffered" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "memory_cached" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "memory_free" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "load_shortterm" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "load_midterm" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "load_longterm" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(value) FROM "processes_count" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "state" = 'blocked' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(value) FROM "processes_count" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "state" = 'paging' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(value) FROM "processes_count" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "state" = 'running' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(value) FROM "processes_count" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "state" = 'sleeping' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(value) FROM "processes_count" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "state" = 'stopped' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(value) FROM "processes_count" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "state" = 'zombies' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(value) FROM "processes_fork_rate" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT last(value) FROM "logged_users" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

targets.series: select last(100.0*avail.value/(used.value + free.value)) from "$server.fs.$mount.space.free" as free inner join "$server.fs.$mount.space.used" as used where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
targets.query: SELECT mean(value) FROM "fs_space_percent_free" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "fs" = '$mount' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "fs_space_used" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "fs" = '$mount' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "fs_space_reserved" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "fs" = '$mount' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "fs_space_free" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "fs" = '$mount' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

targets.series: select last(100.0*avail.value/(used.value + free.value)) from "$server.fs.$mount.space.free" as free inner join "$server.fs.$mount.space.used" as used where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
targets.query: SELECT mean(value) FROM "fs_inodes_percent_free" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "fs" = '$mount' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "fs_inodes_used" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "fs" = '$mount' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "fs_inodes_reserved" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "fs" = '$mount' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "fs_inodes_free" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "fs" = '$mount' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(value) FROM "disk_merged_read" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "device" = '$disk' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(value) FROM "disk_merged_write" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "device" = '$disk' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(value) FROM "disk_ops_read" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "device" = '$disk' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(value) FROM "disk_ops_write" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "device" = '$disk' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

SELECT max(value) FROM "disk_octets_write" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "device" = '$disk' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

SELECT max(value) FROM "if_octets_tx" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "interface" = '$interface' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(value) FROM "if_packets_rx" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "interface" = '$interface' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(value) FROM "if_packets_tx" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "interface" = '$interface' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

SELECT max(value) FROM "if_errors_tx" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND "interface" = '$interface' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "swap_used" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "swap_cached" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "swap_free" WHERE "hostname" = '$server' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

list.name: server
list.query: show tag values from cpu_idle with  key="hostname"

list.name: disk
list.query: show tag values from disk_merged_read with key="device"

list.name: mount
list.query: show tag values from fs_inodes_free with key="fs"

list.name: interface
list.query: show tag values from if_errors_rx with key="interface"
